TopicTitle: J-X4 Engine not available in career mode

Articles.Content:
I have unlocked High Altitude Flight in Career mode and the J-X4 engine but I can't seem to see it in the engines section of the parts list.  In the science tree it shows that the group is "Researched" and the part is "Owned".

How do I fix this?

Thanks,

Hi GreyArea.

The J-X4 was moved from High Altitude Flight to Hypersonic Flight in 1.0.5

If you are using a 1.0.4 or earlier save in 1.0.5 you will see this and other parts in both nodes.

This was done to reduce the likelihood of player craft that were already using these parts in flight from being deleted when upgrading to 1.0.5
